title: Argentina’s US$870-million boost of IMF holdings points to US aid
description:
Argentina’s holdings at the International Monetary Fund jumped last month by the same amount that the US government’s assets declined, as data from the lender could indicate a new form of US financial aid to President Javier Milei’s government.

title: Poland sees room for growth with ‘perfect match’ Argentina
description:

title: Economy grew 5% year-on-year in September, says INDEC
description:
Argentina’s economy expanded more than expected in September despite heightened market turmoil brought on by local and national midterm elections.

title: Argentina’s October inflation ticks up to 2.3%
description:
Argentina’s prices went up by 2.3% in October, a slight increase from the previous month’s 2.1% inflation rate, figures released by the INDEC statistics bureau showed on Wednesday afternoon.

It is the third month in a row that inflation has risen and the fifth month it has not fallen.

title: INDEC confirms inflation accelerated slightly in October
description:
Inflation in Argentina accelerated last month in the build-up to key legislative elections, with consumer prices rising 2.3 percent.

title: Dogecoin News: Argentina Embraces Dogecoin Payments Amid Inflation Concerns

title: Global Unemployment Rates 2025: South Africa Leads, Asia Records Lowest Levels
